description:
Do you sing or play guitar, bass, keyboards, drums, percussion or any other instrument - then this course will surely benefit you!

Everyone knows that Timing is one of the most important basic skills every musician and vocalist needs to have. Do YOU have what it takes to play like a pro???
I am Eshan Khadaroo, and I am pro musician who has worked with the likes of Cirque Du Soleil, Blue Man Group and artists such as Imogen Heap and Incognito to name a few and training to the following exercises was a large part in getting me there.
In this course, I am releasing my own personal timing tests that I have developed over the years to test and train my Timing skills and assess in the most sobering of ways whether I need to hit the practice pads or not.
Now you too can take the Ultimate Timing Tests to asses and train your own Timing skills.
I am so confident that you will get as much value out of these exercises as I have, that you have a full 30 day money back guarantee if you don't enjoy them!
So why not go ahead and start honing your Timing Skills today!
title: The ULTIMATE Music Timing Tests
